front.title: Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Signaling Extensions for G.709 Optical Transport Networks Control

abstract.t: This document is a companion to the Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) signalling documents. It describes the technology specific information needed to extend GMPLS signalling to control Optical Transport Networks (OTN); it also includes the so-called pre-OTN developments.
